籤詩版本二:
ʻAlohilohi ka pahi kaua ke puka mai i waho o ka pahu, akā ʻaʻole ia e huki i ka lepo i loko o ka pahu.
I kēia manawa he kanaka hanohano koʻu e hōʻike ai, me ka mana a me ka mana, a mahalo nā mea a pau iaʻu
詩意:
Hōʻike kēia hexagram i ka pahi kaua e puka mai ana mai loko mai o ka pahu.
He mana a he mana nā mea a pau.
解曰: Puka mai ka pahikaua mai loko mai o ka pahu. Maikaʻi no nā kaukani mile. Alakaʻi hanohano. Nani nā mea a pau.
籤詩故事一:
◇ Hoʻopakele ʻo Zhao Zilong iā Adou
I ka wā o nā Aupuni ʻEkolu, ʻo Zhao Yun, ʻo Zilong ka inoa aloha, he kamaʻāina ʻo Changshan. I ka wā mua, hilinaʻi ʻo ia iā Yuan Shao, a laila hahai ʻo Liu (Bei), ka haku mua o Western Shu.
I kēlā manawa, makemake ʻo Cao Cao e hele i ka hema o ka muliwai ʻo Yangtze, ua hoʻouka mua ʻo ia i ka haku mua ʻo Liu Bei ma Xinye (inoa wahi), a ua holo ka haku mua i Fancheng. Ua pio hou ʻo ia ma Dangyang a ua kaʻawale nā ​​lālā o kona ʻohana. Ua hui ʻo Zhao Yun me Mrs. Wei (Mrs. Liu Bei) ma lalo o ka pā honua.
Ua hāʻawi ka lede i kāna keiki ʻo Adou (ke keiki a Liu Bei, ʻo Liu Chan) iā Zhao Yun. Ua hāʻawi ʻo Zhao Yun i ka lio i ka lede, akā hōʻole ka lede i ka ʻae ʻana a kiola iā ia iho i loko o ka luawai a make.
Ma hope o ka uē ʻana o Zhao Yun a kanu i kāna wahine, ua pūliki ʻo ia iā Adou a hakakā i kona ala i waho o ka pā.
聖意: E pule no ka pomaikai no kou home a me kou ola ponoi, no ka waiwai a me ka waiwai, ka mare maikai, ka pomaikai, ka pomaikai, ka pomaikai, ka pomaikai, ka pomaikai, pōmaikaʻi
古人: Hoʻopakele ʻo Zhao Zilong iā Adou
第X籤: He iwakāluakūmāiwa i lanakila i ka hailona
